methods.name: createCommandSourceStack
javadoc: Creates a CommandSource for resolving the contents of a book. If the player is null, a fake commandsource for this lectern is used.

methods.name: hasBook
javadoc: True if the item in this lectern is a book or written book. False if it is another item (i.e. an empty stack)

methods.name: onlyOpCanSetNbt
javadoc:
Checks if players can use this tile entity to access operator (permission level 2) commands either directly or indirectly, such as give or setblock. A similar method exists for entities at {@link net.minecraft.entity.Entity#ignoreItemEntityData()}.

For example, {@link net.minecraft.tileentity.TileEntitySign#onlyOpsCanSetNbt() signs} (player right-clicking) and {@link net.minecraft.tileentity.TileEntityCommandBlock#onlyOpsCanSetNbt() command blocks} are considered accessible.

@return true if this block entity offers ways for unauthorized players to use restricted commands

methods.name: resolveBook
javadoc: Resolves the passed book, if it is a book and has not yet been resolved.

methods.name: setBook
javadoc: Sets the item stack in this lectern. Note that this does not update the block state use {@link LecternBlock#tryPlaceBook} for that.

methods.name: setBook
javadoc: Sets the item stack in this lectern. Note that this does not update the block state use {@link LecternBlock#tryPlaceBook} for that.
